lines.gurmukhi: Awpno suAMnu sB kwhUAY suMdr lwgY sPlu suMdrqw sMswr mY srwhIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Aapano Suannu Sabh Kaahooai Soundar Laagai , Sadhalu Soundarataa Sansaar Mai Saraaheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: To everyone, his/her son looks beautiful. But one whom others praise is certainly beautiful.

lines.gurmukhi: Awpno bnju buro lwgq n kwhU irdY jwie jgu Blo khY soeI qau ibswhIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Aapano Banaju Buro Laagat N Kaahoo Ridai , Jaai Jagu Bhalo Kahai Soee Tau Bisaaheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: No one dislikes his profession, but one should trade only those commodities which are praised by others.

lines.gurmukhi: Awpny krmu kulw Drm krq sBY auqmu krmu log byd AvgwhIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Aapanay Karamu Kulaa Dharam Karat Sabhai , Outamu Karamu Log Bayd Avagaaheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Everyone follows rites and traditions of one's family, but all deeds which are as per scriptures and according to social traditions are considered supreme.

lines.gurmukhi: gur ibnu mukiq n hoie sb koaU khY mwieAw mY audwsu rwKY soeI gur cwhIAY ]553]
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Binu Moukati N Hoi Sab Kooo Kahai , Maaiaa Mai Udaasu Raakhai Soee Gur Chaaheeai ?553?

Shabad OS B.translation: Everyone says that no salvation can be achieved without a Guru, but one requires such a capable True Guru who can guide a person to salvation through His advice while living a householder's life, in a society and enjoying all material comforts.  (553)
